subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Luol Deng helped stop LeBron James on a drive in the final seconds as the Chicago Bulls ended the Cleveland Cavaliers’ three-game winning streak with an 86-85 victory.
snippet: Luol Deng helped stop LeBron James on a drive in the final seconds as the Chicago Bulls ended the Cleveland Cavaliers’ three-game winning streak with an 86-85 victory.
